name: FPS Unlocked
author: Inidar
description: Unlock the frame rate beyond Terraria's default 60 FPS with smooth frame interpolation. Game logic stays at 60hz while rendering runs at your display rate. Choose VSync (vanilla), a custom cap, or fully uncapped.

mode.label: Frame Rate Mode
mode.description: VSync = vanilla 60 FPS, Capped = custom limit, Uncapped = no limit

maxFps.label: Max FPS (Capped Mode)
maxFps.description: Maximum frame rate when mode is set to Capped (30-1000)

interpolation.label: Frame Interpolation
interpolation.description: Smooth entity motion between game ticks. Keeps game logic at 60hz while rendering at display rate. Disable for raw FPS unlock where game speed scales with FPS.

mouseEveryFrame.label: Responsive Mouse
mouseEveryFrame.description: Update mouse position every render frame for lower input lag (only applies when interpolation is enabled).
